this job is for deleting old poa_stage data for more than 6 months

active process since 03/08/2011 for manual run of poadw monthly file loads into POADW database. This need to run once in each month manually after all files has been loadd by users in \\syda2ssqlr1\loadfiles\poadw\current\monthly folder.

This job was an older version of 10.12_PMA Import - Monthly Oracle Data, which has been converted to SSIS package, after this SP based Script. The reason behind this change is this sql code expose OracleGL password in command line..Do not remove this job..this might be handy in case of package job failure or adhoc queries..Modified by Kaushiik Saha 10/10/2010
active process since 03/08/2011 for manual run of poadw daily adhoc file load POADW database. NOTE: No need to enable this unless the script load failed from wherescapeRed
active process since 03/08/2011 for manual run of poadw monthly apollo issuer data into POADW database.NOTE: No need to enable this unless the script load failed from wherescapeRed

active process since 03/08/2011 for manual run of poadw monthly proview data into POADW database. Note: This need to run automatically once in each month to load Proview Reject Txns. Run properties can be controlled by dbo.SSIS_configurations table.
active process since 03/08/2011 for manual run of poadw daily apollo hrly data into POADW database.NOTE: No need to enable this unless the script load failed from wherescapeRed.
This job has to run first as per the job no, which basically initializes previous day to run._x000D_ _x000D_ Note: This job cannot be enabled unless you bring in the db : FD_MAINTENACE

Job Calls FD Wraper package with a JobName parameter that selects a package set and sequence for execution._x000D_ Note: This only for adhoc purpose, on demand only.

deployed on 3/5/2010 by KS to bypass SQLServer --> Sybase Staging process for ANZTelecheck database and Mthly Reports
Apollo extracts for VPOSCentral Trxn Summary Monthly Reports.

this extract has been imported from sql 2000 (BOQVECount, BOQVEStatus, MACount, MACount2, VECount, VECount2, VEStatus)

This job is to periodically copy syda1svsql1.CCD..Headoffice table contents into syda5svsql2.XTP..CCD_Headoffice table to facilitate XTP reporting. This job is required to run and monitor after migartion of xtp into 2008 version.
Automated AR Invoice Data extracts for Finance into FDANZ_HCDR. Runs each month consecutive first 7 days to ensure all changes on oracleGL has been brought forward.
Daily report from Tracker for Project Taylor (Richard Ridge for Jackie Kwang, Maria DIckinson)

agreement and terminal extracts from servicecenter to Proview (SCATMINFO) table, to update terminalinfo in ATM_INFO table in proview32 database_x000D_ _x000D_ NOTE: This process has been suspended since 12/03/2013 due to unavailability of Proview32 database in CERT (lab server)

Evibs Automation for INDUE. This process loads file send by indue in online reports folder and send data into Evibs sybase database. There can be multiple files in a day. Re-processing is not permitted unless processed data properly deleted from syabse as per documented in process manual._x000D_ _x000D_ Note: Email notification is enabled for this job.

import data from clarity excel files
export team list to enter manual standard hours
import back the team hours into dashboard

Job for bwams rebate extrcat for Finance and Acquiring services, this has been shifted from ecom-dbs2 transearch base data to apollo based data.Current version 4.0. This job need to Run manually based on Input file in R:\BWAMS\Rebates\v4\bwams_rebate_input_yyyymm.xls. This file will be sent by CONG MARINA or STEPHANIE KHULEE (EFT Acquiring Services).
Data Collector job for collection set [Disk Usage]
Collect instance's virtual file stats (** Version 1.0 **)
Collect instance's file size and growth specifications for all user databases/tables (** Version 1.0 **)
Collect instance's table fragmentation stats (** Version 1.0 **)
Collect (& groom) instance rowcounts for all user databases/tables (** Version 3.0 **)
Not really gathering db stats like most of the other jobs. This just keeps the amount of DB and Log backup history stored in msdb under control. (** Version 1.0 **)
Not really gathering db stats like most of the other jobs. This just keeps the amount of statistics data under control (eg. for no-longer in existence DBs). (** Version 1.1 **)
Rotates SQL errorlog so that size is at a reasonable limit and can be read over the network via SQL Enterprise Manager as well as checked daily.
daily/weekly all database data and log space reports
Custom db maintenance job based on script from maintenance database._x000D_ _x000D_ Created by : Kaushik Saha_x000D_ Create Dt : 16/12/2011
Runs every day and removes data from Management Data Warehouse database that reached its expiration date.

if not exists(select * from [POA_Stage].[dbo].[RunMonth] _x000D_ where YearMonth=convert(varchar(6),getdate(),112))_x000D_ Begin_x000D_ INSERT INTO [POA_Stage].[dbo].[RunMonth]([YearMonth],[IsActive])_x000D_ VALUES(convert(varchar(6),getdate(),112),0) _x000D_ End_x000D_ _x000D_ UPDATE dbo.RunMonth_x000D_ set IsActive=0_x000D_ ,LastModifiedDt=getdate()_x000D_ ,ModifiedBy=suser_name()_x000D_ where YearMonth=convert(varchar(6),dateadd(m,-2,getdate()),112)_x000D_ _x000D_ UPDATE dbo.RunMonth_x000D_ set IsActive=1_x000D_ ,LastModifiedDt=getdate()_x000D_ ,ModifiedBy=suser_name()_x000D_ where YearMonth=convert(varchar(6),dateadd(m,-1,getdate()),112)

declare @i int, @RunMonth datetime_x000D_ set @RunMonth=CONVERT(varchar(10),dateadd(m,-1,getdate()),120)_x000D_ select @RunMonth_x000D_ exec @i=[dbo].[usp_gl_ManualAdjustments] @RunMonth,'XXAUGLEXT',' D1amond*0!','UFOPRD1',0_x000D_ select @i

declare @i int, @RunMonth datetime_x000D_ set @RunMonth=CONVERT(varchar(10),dateadd(m,-1,getdate()),120)_x000D_ select @RunMonth_x000D_ exec @i=[dbo].[usp_gl_TMRevenue] @RunMonth,'XXAUGLEXT',' D1amond*0!','UFOPRD1',0_x000D_ select @i

---point to FD_Maintenance database and run this script_x000D_ _x000D_ /***_x000D_ UPDATE Maint.Financial_Period_Status_x000D_ SET StatusFlag = 0_x000D_ WHERE StatusFlag <> 0_x000D_ AND PeriodID IN_x000D_ (_x000D_ SELECT CAST(CONVERT(NVARCHAR(20), DATEADD(dd, -1, GETDATE()), 112) AS INT)_x000D_ )_x000D_ ***/

/DTS "\MSDB\FD\FD_000_Wrapper" /SERVER SYDA2SSQLR1 /CONNECTION Maint;"\"Data Source=SYDB1SDB1;Initial Catalog=FD_Maintenance;Provider=SQLNCLI10.1;Integrated Security=SSPI;Auto Translate=False;\"" /X86 /CHECKPOINTING OFF /SET "\Package.Variables[User::tmpJobName].Properties[Value]";"Switch Data Import" /REPORTING E

/DTS "\MSDB\FD\FD_000_Wrapper" /SERVER SYDA2SSQLR1 /CONNECTION Maint;"\"Data Source=SYDB1SDB1;Initial Catalog=FD_Maintenance;Provider=SQLNCLI10.1;Integrated Security=SSPI;Auto Translate=False;\"" /X86 /CHECKPOINTING OFF /SET "\Package.Variables[User::tmpJobName].Properties[Value]";"Switch Cube Process" /REPORTING E

/DTS "\MSDB\FD\FD_000_Wrapper" /SERVER SYDA2SSQLR1 /CONNECTION Maint;"\"Data Source=SYDB1SDB1;Initial Catalog=FD_Maintenance;Provider=SQLNCLI10.1;Integrated Security=SSPI;Auto Translate=False;\"" /X86 /CHECKPOINTING OFF /SET "\Package.Variables[User::tmpJobName].Properties[Value]";"Create Partition and Process Cube" /REPORTING E
update DBA.dbo.[SSIS Configurations]_x000D_ set ConfiguredValue=convert(varchar(10),dateadd(d,-datepart(d,GETDATE()),GETDATE()),120)_x000D_ where ConfigurationFilter='TELECHECK_Period'

declare @str as varchar(1000)_x000D_ select @str='xcopy \\syda1sfs2\ftproot\insight2\OnlineReports\' + convert(varchar(6),dateadd(dy,0,GETDATE()),12)+'\MSFPRO'+convert(varchar(6),dateadd(dy,-1,GETDATE()),12)+'.tar.zip' + ' \\syda1sfs2\ftproot\insight2\OnlineReports\MSPROFIT\ /y'_x000D_ exec xp_cmdshell @str

update dbo.[SSIS Configurations]_x000D_ set ConfiguredValue=-2_x000D_ where ConfigurationFilter='FRAUD_ANALYTIC_DayInterVal'_x000D_ _x000D_ --do not uncomment this unless you r running old dates_x000D_ --update dbo.[SSIS Configurations]_x000D_ --set ConfiguredValue=ConfiguredValue+1_x000D_ --where ConfigurationFilter='FRAUD_ANALYTIC_DayInterVal'

/SQL "\VPOS_TxnSummary" /SERVER SYDA2SSQLR1 /CONNECTION vposcentral;"\"Data Source=SYDB2SVSQL1;Initial Catalog=vposcentral;Provider=SQLNCLI10.1;Integrated Security=SSPI;Application Name=SSIS-VPOS_TxnSummary-{C6B57373-AF88-4355-AE43-1213794C19DE}SYDA1SVSQL1.vposcentral;Auto Translate=False;\"" /X86 /CHECKPOINTING OFF /REPORTING E
Copy Headoffice table from CCD to XTP

use msdb_x000D_ go_x000D_ declare @ssisstr varchar(8000)_x000D_ declare @packagename varchar(200)_x000D_ declare @servername varchar(100)_x000D_ declare @params varchar(8000)_x000D_ _x000D_ set @packagename = 'AR_InvoiceData_Extract'_x000D_ set @servername = 'SYDA2SSQLR1'_x000D_ set @ssisstr = 'dtexec /sq ' + @packagename + ' /ser ' + @servername + ' '_x000D_ print @ssisstr_x000D_ _x000D_ if DATEPART(d,getdate()) in (1,2,3,4,5,6,7)_x000D_ BEGIN_x000D_ DECLARE @returncode int_x000D_ EXEC @returncode = xp_cmdshell @ssisstr_x000D_ select @returncode_x000D_ END_x000D_ GO_x000D_
/SQL "\Tracker OOC DailyTracker OOC" /SERVER syda2ssqlr1 /X86 /CHECKPOINTING OFF /REPORTING E
Update dbo.ETL_Config_x000D_ --set ConfiguredValue = '20121017'_x000D_ set ConfiguredValue = convert(char(8),getdate(),112)_x000D_ where ConfigurationFilter='Evibs_ProcessDt'

update dbo.ETL_Config_x000D_ set configuredValue = convert(varchar(8),dateadd(d,1,cast(configuredValue as datetime)),112)_x000D_ --set configuredValue = convert(varchar(8),dateadd(d,-1,getdate()),112)_x000D_ where ConfigurationFilter = 'EFTPOS_ProcessDt'_x000D_ GO

/SQL "\"\FDETL\ATM_Fee_TerminalGroup_Sync\"" /SERVER syda2ssqlr1 /CONNECTION ETLStaging;"\"Data Source=syda2ssqlr1;Initial Catalog=FDETLMAINT;Provider=SQLNCLI11;Integrated Security=SSPI;\"" /CHECKPOINTING OFF /REPORTING E

truncate table TERMINAL_GROUP_x000D_ go_x000D_ _x000D_ INSERT INTO [DBA].[dbo].[TERMINAL_GROUP]_x000D_ ([TERM_GROUP]_x000D_ ,[DESCRIPTION]_x000D_ ,[MAINT_USER_ID]_x000D_ ,[MAINT_TIMESTAMP])_x000D_ SELECT [TERM_GROUP] _x000D_ ,[DESCRIPTION] _x000D_ ,[MAINT_USER_ID] _x000D_ ,[MAINT_TIMESTAMP]_x000D_ FROM [FEECRT1].[FEECRT1].[FEE].[TERMINAL_GROUP]

truncate table TERMINAL_GROUPPRD_x000D_ go_x000D_ _x000D_ INSERT INTO [DBA].[dbo].[TERMINAL_GROUPPRD]_x000D_ ([TERM_GROUP]_x000D_ ,[DESCRIPTION]_x000D_ ,[MAINT_USER_ID]_x000D_ ,[MAINT_TIMESTAMP])_x000D_ select _x000D_ [TERM_GROUP]_x000D_ ,[DESCRIPTION]_x000D_ ,[MAINT_USER_ID]_x000D_ ,[MAINT_TIMESTAMP]_x000D_ from FEEPRD1..FEE.TERMINAL_GROUP

ALTER PARTITION SCHEME PS_Transaction_Date_Setl_x000D_ NEXT USED [TSPartitionfg1]_x000D_ go_x000D_ declare @day char(10)_x000D_ select @day=CONVERT(CHAR(10), GETDATE(), 120)_x000D_ ALTER PARTITION FUNCTION PF_Transaction_Date_Setl() SPLIT RANGE (@Day);

DECLARE @v_strExecSQL VARCHAR(1000)_x000D_ PRINT 'Killing active connections to the POADW database'_x000D_ _x000D_ -- Create the sql to kill the active database connections_x000D_ SET @v_strExecSQL = ''_x000D_ SELECT @v_strExecSQL = @v_strExecSQL + 'kill ' + CONVERT(CHAR(10), spid) + ' '_x000D_ FROM master.dbo.sysprocesses_x000D_ WHERE DB_NAME(dbid) = 'POADW' AND DBID <> 0 AND spid <> @@spid_x000D_ -- Print @v_strExecSQL_x000D_ EXEC (@v_strExecSQL)_x000D_ _x000D_ _x000D_ _x000D_ RESTORE DATABASE [POADW] FROM DISK = N'D:\MSSQL\DBDumps\poadw.bak' WITH FILE = 1, _x000D_ MOVE N'POADW' TO N'D:\MSSQL\DATA\POADW1.mdf', MOVE N'poadw_costrev' _x000D_ TO N'D:\MSSQL\DATA\POADW.ndf', MOVE N'poadw_term' _x000D_ TO N'D:\MSSQL\DATA\POADW1.ndf', MOVE N'poadw_tran' TO N'D:\MSSQL\DATA\POADW2.ndf', _x000D_ MOVE N'POADW_log' TO N'D:\MSSQL\TLog\POADW.ldf', NOUNLOAD, REPLACE, STATS = 1_x000D_ GO_x000D_

/FILE "D:\Program Files\SummitCloud\SCRUBS\SSIS\SCRUBS_SSRS_Log_Feed.dtsx" /CONNECTION Destination;"\"Data Source=syda2ssqlr1;Initial Catalog=SummitCloud_SCRUBS;Provider=SQLNCLI10.1;Integrated Security=SSPI;Auto Translate=False;\"" /CONNECTION Source;"\"Data Source=syda2ssqlr1;Initial Catalog=ReportServer;Provider=SQLNCLI10.1;Integrated Security=SSPI;Auto Translate=False;\"" /CHECKPOINTING OFF /SET "\Package.Variables[User::FullLogging].Properties[Value]";True /REPORTING E

--add partition ahead of 3 days_x000D_ declare @date datetime_x000D_ set @date=current_timestamp_x000D_ ALTER PARTITION SCHEME PS_xtpTransaction NEXT USED [XTPTRAN];_x000D_ select @date=convert(varchar(10),DATEADD(d,3,@date),120)_x000D_ select @date_x000D_ ALTER PARTITION FUNCTION [PF_xtptransaction]() SPLIT RANGE (@date);_x000D_
